title: CALIFORNIA SURF LODGE
description: Endless summer vibes where the Beach Boys meet Big Wednesday. Sun-bleached hair, VW buses, and that perfect wave that's always just around the next point. Hang ten, dude.

beach_boys.title: BEACH BOYS BREAKFAST
beach_boys.description: Good Vibrations - Harmony-rich surf pop with California dreaming

good_vibrations.title: Good Vibrations Special
good_vibrations.description: Pure California harmony with that Pet Sounds sophistication. Every song sounds like driving PCH with the top down and the ocean on your right.
good_vibrations.samples: "Good Vibrations" by The Beach Boys, "California Gurls" by The Beach Boys, "Surfin' USA" by The Beach Boys
